name: sample_v1
description: Sample golden dataset for testing the evaluation suite

test_cases.question: What is the relationship between artificial intelligence and machine learning?
test_cases.expected_answer: Machine learning is a subset of artificial intelligence that focuses on algorithms that can learn from data.
ground_truth_context: Machine learning is a subset of AI
AI encompasses various techniques including ML

test_cases.question: How do transformer models relate to GPT and BERT?
test_cases.expected_answer: Both GPT and BERT are based on the transformer architecture. GPT uses decoder-only transformers for generative tasks, while BERT uses encoder-only transformers for understanding tasks.
ground_truth_context: GPT is a decoder-only transformer model
BERT is an encoder-only transformer model
Both models are based on the transformer architecture

test_cases.question: Who founded OpenAI and what products have they released?
test_cases.expected_answer: OpenAI was founded by Sam Altman, Elon Musk, and others in 2015. They have released products including GPT-3, GPT-4, ChatGPT, DALL-E, and Codex.
ground_truth_context: Sam Altman is CEO of OpenAI

test_cases.question: What is deep learning?
test_cases.expected_answer: Deep learning is a subset of machine learning that uses neural networks with multiple layers to learn hierarchical representations of data.
ground_truth_context: Deep learning uses multi-layer neural networks
It is a type of machine learning

test_cases.question: What is the current stock price of Apple?
test_cases.rejection_reason: Real-time stock prices are not available in the knowledge graph

test_cases.question: Tell me about a new AI startup called NeuralMind that develops brain-computer interfaces.
test_cases.expected_answer: I don't have information about NeuralMind in my knowledge base.

metadata.note: Tests whether agent correctly adds new entities with proper schema
